text: vA a#rddhamAqsasyaq rAtra#yO&rddhamAsaqSaH sa#M~Mvathsaqra A$pyatEq tAsAqM trINi# ca SaqtAni# ShaqShTiScAqkSharA#Niq tAva#tIH saM~Mvathsaqrasyaq rAtra#yO&kSharaqSa Eqva sa#M~MvathsaqramA$pnOti nRuqmEdha#Scaq paru#cCEpaSca brahmaqvAdya#mavadEtAmaqsmin dArA#vAqrdrE$&gniM ja#nayAva yataqrO nauq brahmI#yAqniti# nRuqmEdhOq&Bya#vadaqth sa dhUqmama#janayaqt paru#cCEpOq &Bya#vadaqth sO$&gnima#janayaqdRuShaq itya#bravIqd-  [  ]  46
